statements: DELETE FROM candidates WHERE position = 'Senator' AND political_affiliation = 'Independent';
DELETE FROM candidates WHERE political_affiliation = 'Independent' AND position = 'Mayor';
DELETE FROM campaign_contributions WHERE donor_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM campaign_contributions WHERE candidate_id = 1 AND amount > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM candidates WHERE political_affiliation = 'Independent' AND past_experience LIKE '%government%';
DELETE FROM donations WHERE amount > 500 AND donation_date < '2021-12-31';
DELETE FROM endorsements WHERE endorsement_id = 3 AND candidate_id = 4
